body_html: You still need to decide on behavior for volatile, which can't default to anything because it's the volatile status of the input data that determines whether the whole computation will be in train or inference mode.
body_text: You still need to decide on behavior for volatile, which can't default to anything because it's the volatile status of the input data that determines whether the whole computation will be in train or inference mode.
body: You still need to decide on behavior for `volatile`, which can't default to anything because it's the `volatile` status of the input data that determines whether the whole computation will be in train or inference mode.
